articles.title: Biden falls off bike while riding near Delaware home, says 'I'm good'
articles.description: "I'm good," Biden said after the fall, which took place within view of the press pool. He appeared uninjured upon standing after the incident.
articles.content:
President Joe Biden took a tumble from his bike on Saturday while riding near his home in Rehoboth Beach, Delaware.

articles.title: Authorities sold seized horse back to owner due to cost of keeping it
articles.description: Lex, a showjumping horse, was bought for $750,000 by accountant Jack Fisher, who was indicted in a $1.3 billion tax fraud case, Bloomberg reported.
articles.content:
